name: Gum-Gum Jet Spear
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 0 Life cards, draw 1 card.
trigger: [Trigger] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: Add up to 1 card from your hand to the top of your Life cards.
